attributes.additional_details: The real black hole in the UK’s economy is all the economic growth and investment we’ve lost due to Brexit. By rejoining the European Union we’d be able to trade freely with our closest neighbours and allies, boost British businesses and allow low-paid workers to easily return to work in our country - which many small businesses desperately need.
attributes.background: The UK Government should seek to rejoin the European Union under Article 49 of the Maastricht Treaty. Public opinion has shifted since Brexit and it’s only right we have a seat around the table with our largest trading partner and neighbours.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  

Apply for the UK to join the European Union as a full member as soon as possible - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700005
